name: Osmapping
tagline: Library for mapping open street map shapefiles and overlaying data
body:
This package allows basic mapping from shapefile data from OpenStreetMaps or Mapzen.

Other data can be transformed and overlayed on the map for analysis.

Map views are plotting from shapefiles which can be very large, but this forgoes the need for tiles, tileservers, or any kind of precompilation
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
